page.description: Gets the value for a field in every row of the Grid and returns a delimited string. Default value for delimiter is a comma.

argument.name: fieldname
argument.description: The field that you want to retrieve all row values from.

argument.name: delimiter
argument.description: Default = ",". The delimiter used to separate row values.

section.title: Example
section.description: Assume a Grid as 3 rows and the value of the Lastname field in these rows is 'Jones', 'Smith' and 'King'. Method returns 'Jones,Smith,King'
